apiDescription: An iterator over messages on a Receiver, created by iter.
This iterator will block whenever next is called, waiting for a new message, and None will be returned when the corresponding channel has hung up.

trait implementations.name: impl<'a, T: std::fmt::Debug + 'a> std::fmt::Debug for std::sync::mpsc::Iter<'a, T>
impl<'a, T> std::iter::Iterator for std::sync::mpsc::Iter<'a, T>
